project.name: Dap Land
project.shortDescription: Dap Land is a video app for basketball. It uses authentic basketball features for challenging players online and for showcase their skills. It can help to unite 450M players and 2B fans.
project.needSummary: Looking yarn for app and back-end developing, SMM, finances, QA
project.elevatorPitch: Dap Land is a video app for basketball. It uses authentic basketball features for challenging players online and for showcase their skills. It can help to unite 450M players and 2B fans.
project.problem: Players can't challenge each other online when they use social media for sharing their skills. On another hand are fans who are just observers and they can't influence the community.
project.mission: We believe we will elevate the basketball community together with players and fans. We will boost players' skills level and engage fans more. Our principle is 'skills say more than a thousand words'.

description.excerpt: This is an app where players challenge each other online and fans showcase players' skills. Everyone can be recognized by the community and get respect with specific basketball rewards.

competition.description: TikTok. We focused only on basketball and we use specific basketball culture things. Players can challenge each other and fans showcase players skills with Dap Land.

cofounderGoals.reason: I need a partner who can compliment my ideas or criticize them. I need a team member who can share their ideas. Two heads are better than one head.
topTraits: ability to hear and to share their doubts

compensationOfferings.title: Custom
compensationOfferings.description: Compensation amounts and options will be based on the qualifications of individual and the service he or she is providing

users.title: Founder
users.bio: I'm a digital product designer with 10 years of experience. I worked both with startups and companies from Fortune 500. Also I have 8-year basketball experience.
users.projectHopes: This is a cross road of two of my passions, basketball and design. I believe I can add new ideas and stream to the community.
users.projectLove: I love building things for the basketball community
